languages.text: "Губернатор Медина скверно послужил живым. Печально думать, как он будет служить Неумирающему, когда Он призовет своего слугу".
"Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Медина скверно послужил живым. Печально думать, как он будет служить Неумирающему, когда Он призовет своего слугу".

traits.locale_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls his servant to His side."
"Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls his servant to His side."
"Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls his servant to His side."
"Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."
"Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

languages.text: "Gouverneur Medineh hat den Lebenden einen Bärendienst erwiesen. Mich schmerzt der Gedanke, wie er dem Todlosen dienen wird, wenn dieser seinen Diener an seine Seite ruft."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Medineh hat den Lebenden einen Bärendienst erwiesen. Mich schmerzt der Gedanke, wie er dem Todlosen dienen wird, wenn dieser seinen Diener an seine Seite ruft."

languages.text: « Le gouverneur Medineh a causé un tort irréparable aux vivants. Quand je pense à la façon dont il servira l'Immortel quand Il le rappellera à Lui, j'en aurais presque les larmes aux yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur Medineh a causé un tort irréparable aux vivants. Quand je pense à la façon dont il servira l'Immortel quand Il le rappellera à Lui, j'en aurais presque les larmes aux yeux. »

languages.text: «El gobernador Medineh ha hecho flaco favor a los vivos. Me duele pensar en cómo servirá al Inmortal cuando Él lo llame a Su lado».
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador Medineh ha hecho flaco favor a los vivos. Me duele pensar en cómo servirá al Inmortal cuando Él lo llame a Su lado».

languages.text: 「メディネ総督は生きている者に重大な不利益をもたらした。不死の者がそのしもべをお呼びになったとき、彼がどのように仕えるのかと思うと悲しくなります」
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

traits.locale_text: 「メディネ総督は生きている者に重大な不利益をもたらした。不死の者がそのしもべをお呼びになったとき、彼がどのように仕えるのかと思うと悲しくなります」

languages.text: “对活着的人而言，梅迪涅总督的做法极其失职。我不愿想象当不死之神将他召唤到祂身旁时，祂会如何裁定他的所作所为。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

traits.locale_text: “对活着的人而言，梅迪涅总督的做法极其失职。我不愿想象当不死之神将他召唤到祂身旁时，祂会如何裁定他的所作所为。”

languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."

languages.text: "Vali Medineh, yaşayanlara muazzam bir kötülük etti. Ölmeyen, hizmetkârını yanına çağırdığında ona nasıl hizmet edeceğini düşünmek bana hüzün veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Governor Medineh has done the living a grave disservice. It grieves me to think how he will serve the Undying One when He calls His servant to His side."
